title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4025.15 - Information required for entry
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4025.15 - Information required for entry

State Regulations
(a) Except as provided in section
4025.16
of this Part, entries shall
be in the name of one person, or a stable name, and shall state the name, or
the stable name, of the managing owner (or when a partnership is the managing
owner, of the managing partner), the name or description of the horse, if
unnamed, and, if the race be for horses of different ages, the age of the horse
entered. (b) All entries and
declarations of horses eligible for administration of furosemide pursuant to
section
4043.2
(b) of this

Title are required to denote the use of furosemide on the entry form. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4025.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
